Package be.geertvanderpijpen.thinkinginjava.examples.chapter03

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BreakAndContinue
    Part of Thinking in Java, 4th edition
    Demonstrates break and continue keywords
    CommaOperator
    Part of Thinking in Java, 4th edition
    Demonstrates the comma operator in a for loop
    ForEachFloat
    Part of Thinking in Java, 4th edition
    Demonstrates the use of the for each operator in Java
    An array of random floats is looped and printed
    ForEachInt  
    ForEachString
    Part of Thinking in Java, 4th edition
    Demonstrates the foreach loop on a String
    The different characters of the String are printed 1 by 1
    IfElse
    Part of Thinking in Java, 4th edition
    Shows how the if-else statement is applied
    The example uses a test value and target value.
    IfElse2
    Part of Thinking in Java, 4th edition
    Shows how the if-else statement is applied
    The example uses a test value and target value.
    LabeledFor
    Part of Thinking in Java, 4th edition
    Demonstrates labeled for continues and breaks
    LabeledWhile
    Part of Thinking in Java, 4th edition
    Demontrates labeled continues and breaks using while loops
    ListCharacters
    Part of Thinking in Java, 4th edition
    Demonstrates the use of the for loop
    List all characters by use of a for loop
    VowelsAndCosonants
    Part of Thinking in Java, 4th edition
    Demonstrates the switch statement by randomly generating letters and determining if they are vowels or cosonants
    WhileTest
    Part of Thinking in Java, 4th edition
    Demonstrates the while loop
    A random number is generated until it is greater or equal to 0.99
